channel.title: Covid19 on C'est la Z
channel.description: Recent content in Covid19 on C'est la Z

item.title: To Zoom or not to Zoom
item.description: Zoom has been on a wild ride. As teachers scrambled to try to deliver instruction from there homes to student homes Zoom quickly became a favorite. It was easy, performed well, and had features that other services seemed to lack. Features like being able to mute students and for me a big one - breakout rooms. Now, these features weren't flawless as I mentioned in my last post but that's okay.
